subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Baltimore Ravens are among the best drafters of talent in the N.F.L., finding hidden gems in the middle rounds. And Ozzie Newsome is a major reason why.
snippet: The Baltimore Ravens are among the best drafters of talent in the N.F.L., finding hidden gems in the middle rounds. And Ozzie Newsome is a major reason why.
